title: The project proponent/s shall apply to the concerned Collector (1) or to the Authority, as the case may be, for obtaining the approval to the Master Layout Plan of the entire area as per Letter of Intent
clause_text: The project proponent/s shall apply to the concerned Collector (1) or to the Authority, as the case may be, for obtaining the approval to the Master Layout Plan of the entire area as per Letter of Intent. Such application shall be accompanied by the documents in two sets as prescribed below :-
section: Master Layout Plan Approval by the Collector (1) or by the Planning Authority, as the case may be :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The project proponent/s shall apply to the concerned Collector (1) or to the Authority, as the case may be, for obtaining the approval to the Master Layout Plan of the entire area as per Letter of Int
